LanguageData.ExtractHemogenPack.label: Extract Safe Water
LanguageData.ExtractHemogenPack.description: Extract a safe water pack from the target. The operation will fail to produce a water pack if the target is dehydrated.\n\nWater packs can be administered to others to reduce dehydration, or simply to increase water levels.
LanguageData.BloodTransfusion.label: Give Water Pack
LanguageData.BloodTransfusion.description: Use safe water packs to reduce the effects of dehydration. Each water pack restore water to water drinking individuals.
